00093 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_ELEMENT_H_EIFESJKLNDFSNMDFS

00097 #include "constraint_equal.h"
00098 #include "../dynamic_constraints/dynamic_new_or.h"

00104 template<typename VarArray, typename IndexRef, typename VarRef>
00105 struct ElementConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00106 {
00107   virtual string constraint_name()
00108   { return "Element"; }
00109   
00110   VarArray var_array;
00111   IndexRef index_ref;
00112   VarRef result_var;
00113   ElementConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array, const IndexRef& _index_ref, const VarRef& _result_var) :
00114     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var_array(_var_array), index_ref(_index_ref), result_var(_result_var)
00115   { }
00116   
00117   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00118   {
00119     triggerCollection t;
00120     int array_size = var_array.size();
00121     for(int i = 0; i < array_size; ++i)
00122       t.push_back(make_trigger(var_array[i], Trigger(this, i), Assigned));
00123     
00124     t.push_back(make_trigger(index_ref, Trigger(this, -1), Assigned));
00125     t.push_back(make_trigger(result_var, Trigger(this, -2), Assigned));
00126     return t;
00127   }
00128   
00129   virtual void propagate(int prop_val, DomainDelta)
00130   {
00131     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(NonGACElement);
00132     if(index_ref.isAssigned())
00133     {
00134       int index = checked_cast<int>(index_ref.getAssignedValue());
00135       if(index < 0 || index >= (int)var_array.size())
00136       {
00137         getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00138         return;
00139       }
00140       DomainInt val_min = max(result_var.getMin(), var_array[index].getMin());
00141       DomainInt val_max = min(result_var.getMax(), var_array[index].getMax());
00142       result_var.setMin(val_min);
00143       var_array[index].setMin(val_min);
00144       result_var.setMax(val_max);
00145       var_array[index].setMax(val_max);
00146     }
00147     else
00148     {
00149       if(prop_val>=0)
00150       {
00151         DomainInt assigned_val = var_array[prop_val].getAssignedValue();
00152         if(index_ref.inDomain(prop_val) && !result_var.inDomain(assigned_val))  //perhaps the check if prop_val is indomain of index_ref is not necessary.
00153         {
00154             if(index_ref.isBound())
00155             {
00156                 if(prop_val==index_ref.getMax()) index_ref.setMax(prop_val-1);
00157                 if(prop_val==index_ref.getMin()) index_ref.setMin(prop_val+1);
00158             }
00159             else
00160             {
00161                 index_ref.removeFromDomain(prop_val);
00162             }
00163         }
00164         
00165       }
00166       else
00167       {
00168         D_ASSERT(prop_val == -2);
00169         DomainInt assigned_val = result_var.getAssignedValue();
00170         int array_size = var_array.size();
00171         for(int i = 0; i < array_size; ++i)
00172         {
00173           if(index_ref.inDomain(i) && !var_array[i].inDomain(assigned_val)) // fixed here.
00174           {
00175               if(index_ref.isBound())
00176               {
00177                   if(i==index_ref.getMax()) index_ref.setMax(i-1);
00178                   if(i==index_ref.getMin()) index_ref.setMin(i+1);
00179               }
00180               else
00181               {
00182                   index_ref.removeFromDomain(i);
00183               }
00184           }
00185         }
00186       }
00187     }
00188   }
00189 
00190   virtual void full_propagate()
00191   {
00192     if(index_ref.isAssigned())
00193     {
00194       int index = checked_cast<int>(index_ref.getAssignedValue());
00195       if(index < 0 || index >= (int)var_array.size())
00196       {
00197         getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00198         return;
00199       }
00200       DomainInt val_min = max(result_var.getMin(), var_array[index].getMin());
00201       DomainInt val_max = min(result_var.getMax(), var_array[index].getMax());
00202       result_var.setMin(val_min);
00203       var_array[index].setMin(val_min);
00204       result_var.setMax(val_max);
00205       var_array[index].setMax(val_max);
00206     }
00207     
00208     int array_size = var_array.size();
00209     // Constrain the index variable to have only indices in range.
00210     if(index_ref.getMin()<0)
00211     {
00212         index_ref.setMin(0);
00213     }
00214     if(index_ref.getMax()>=array_size)
00215     {
00216         index_ref.setMax(array_size-1);
00217     }
00218     if(getState(stateObj).isFailed()) return;
00219     
00220     // Should use the new iterators here. Check each value of result_var to see 
00221     // if it's in one of var_array. 
00222     // Only done at root, so who cares that it takes a while?
00223     if(!result_var.isBound())
00224     {
00225         for(DomainInt i=result_var.getMin(); i<=result_var.getMax(); i++)
00226         {
00227             if(result_var.inDomain(i))
00228             {
00229                 BOOL supported=false;
00230                 for(DomainInt j=index_ref.getMin(); j<=index_ref.getMax(); j++)
00231                 {
00232                     if(var_array[j].inDomain(i))
00233                     {
00234                         supported=true;
00235                         break;
00236                     }
00237                 }
00238                 if(!supported)
00239                 {
00240                     result_var.removeFromDomain(i);
00241                 }
00242             }
00243         }
00244     }
00245     else
00246     {// result_var is a bound variable
00247         // iterate up from the minimum
00248         while(!getState(stateObj).isFailed())
00249         {
00250             DomainInt i=result_var.getMin();
00251             BOOL supported=false;
00252             for(DomainInt j=index_ref.getMin(); j<=index_ref.getMax(); j++)
00253             {
00254                 if(var_array[j].inDomain(i))
00255                 {
00256                     supported=true;
00257                     break;
00258                 }
00259             }
00260             if(!supported)
00261             {
00262                 result_var.setMin(i+1);
00263             }
00264             else
00265                 break;
00266         }
00267         // now iterate down from the top.
00268         while(!getState(stateObj).isFailed())
00269         {
00270             DomainInt i=result_var.getMax();
00271             BOOL supported=false;
00272             for(DomainInt j=index_ref.getMin(); j<=index_ref.getMax(); j++)
00273             {
00274                 if(var_array[j].inDomain(i))
00275                 {
00276                     supported=true;
00277                     break;
00278                 }
00279             }
00280             if(!supported)
00281             {
00282                 result_var.setMax(i-1);
00283             }
00284             else
00285                 break;
00286         }
00287     }
00288     
00289     if(getState(stateObj).isFailed()) return;
00290     
00291     for(int i = index_ref.getMin();i <= index_ref.getMax(); i++)
00292     {
00293       if(index_ref.inDomain(i) && var_array[i].isAssigned())
00294       {
00295         DomainInt assigned_val = var_array[i].getAssignedValue();
00296         if(!result_var.inDomain(assigned_val))
00297         {
00298             if(index_ref.isBound())
00299             {
00300                 if(i==index_ref.getMax()) index_ref.setMax(i-1);
00301                 if(i==index_ref.getMin()) index_ref.setMin(i+1);
00302             }
00303             else
00304             {
00305                 
00306                 index_ref.removeFromDomain(i);
00307             }
00308         }
00309       }
00310     }
00311     
00312     if(result_var.isAssigned())
00313     {
00314       DomainInt assigned_val = result_var.getAssignedValue();
00315       for(int i = 0; i < array_size; ++i)
00316       {
00317         if(index_ref.inDomain(i) && !var_array[i].inDomain(assigned_val))  // fixed here.
00318         {
00319             if(index_ref.isBound())
00320             {
00321                 if(i==index_ref.getMax()) index_ref.setMax(i-1);
00322                 if(i==index_ref.getMin()) index_ref.setMin(i+1);
00323             }
00324             else
00325             {
00326                 index_ref.removeFromDomain(i);
00327             }
00328         }
00329       }
00330     }
00331     
00332   }
00333   
00334   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00335   {
00336     int length = v_size;
00337     if(v[length-2] < 0 || v[length-2] > length - 3)
00338       return false;
00339     return v[checked_cast<int>(v[length-2])] == v[length-1];
00340   }
00341   
00342   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00343   { 
00344     vector<AnyVarRef> array;
00345     array.reserve(var_array.size() + 2);
00346     for(unsigned int i=0;i<var_array.size(); ++i)
00347       array.push_back(var_array[i]);
00348     array.push_back(index_ref);
00349     array.push_back(result_var);
00350     return array;
00351   }
00352   
00353   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00354   {  
00355     int array_start = max(DomainInt(0), index_ref.getMin());
00356     int array_end   = min((DomainInt)var_array.size() - 1, index_ref.getMax());
00357 
00358     for(int i = array_start; i <= array_end; ++i)
00359     {
00360       if(index_ref.inDomain(i))
00361       {
00362         int dom_start = max(raw(result_var.getMin()), raw(var_array[i].getMin()));
00363         int dom_end   = min(raw(result_var.getMax()), raw(var_array[i].getMax()));
00364         for(int domval = dom_start; domval <= dom_end; ++domval)
00365         {
00366           if(var_array[i].inDomain(domval) && result_var.inDomain(domval))
00367           {
00368             // index_ref = i
00369             assignment.push_back(make_pair(var_array.size(), i));
00370             // result_var = domval
00371             assignment.push_back(make_pair(var_array.size() + 1, domval));
00372             // vararray[i] = domval
00373             assignment.push_back(make_pair(i, domval));
00374             return true;
00375           }
00376         }
00377       }
00378     }
00379     return false;
00380   }
00381   
00382   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00383   {
00384       // This is a slow-ish temporary solution.
00385       // (i=1 and X[1]!=r) or (i=2 ...
00386       vector<AbstractConstraint*> con;
00387       // or the index is out of range:
00388       vector<int> r; r.push_back(0); r.push_back(var_array.size()-1);
00389       AbstractConstraint* t4=(AbstractConstraint*) new WatchNotInRangeConstraint<IndexRef>(stateObj, index_ref, r);
00390       con.push_back(t4);
00391       
00392       for(int i=0; i<var_array.size(); i++)
00393       {
00394           vector<AbstractConstraint*> con2;
00395           WatchLiteralConstraint<IndexRef>* t=new WatchLiteralConstraint<IndexRef>(stateObj, index_ref, i);
00396           con2.push_back((AbstractConstraint*) t);
00397           NeqConstraintBinary<AnyVarRef, VarRef>* t2=new NeqConstraintBinary<AnyVarRef, VarRef>(stateObj, var_array[i], result_var);
00398           con2.push_back((AbstractConstraint*) t2);
00399           
00400           Dynamic_AND* t3= new Dynamic_AND(stateObj, con2);
00401           con.push_back((AbstractConstraint*) t3);
00402       }
00403       
00404       return new Dynamic_OR(stateObj, con);
00405   }
00406 };
00407 
00408 
00409 template<typename Var1, typename Var2>
00410 AbstractConstraint*
00411 BuildCT_ELEMENT(StateObj* stateObj, const Var1& vararray, const Var2& v1, const Var1& v2, ConstraintBlob&)
00412 { 
00413   return new ElementConstraint<Var1, typename Var2::value_type, typename Var1::value_type>
00414               (stateObj, vararray, v1[0], v2[0]);  
00415 }
00416 
00417 template<typename Var1, typename Var2, typename Var3>
00418 AbstractConstraint*
00419 BuildCT_ELEMENT(StateObj* stateObj, Var1 vararray, const Var2& v1, const Var3& v2, ConstraintBlob&)
00420 { 
00421   return new ElementConstraint<Var1, typename Var2::value_type, AnyVarRef>
00422               (stateObj, vararray, v1[0], AnyVarRef(v2[0]));  
00423 }
00424 
00425 template<typename Var1, typename Var2, typename Var3>
00426 AbstractConstraint*
00427 BuildCT_ELEMENT_ONE(StateObj* stateObj, const Var1& vararray, const Var2& v1, const Var3& v2, ConstraintBlob& b)
00428 { 
00429   typedef typename ShiftType<typename Var2::value_type, compiletime_val<-1> >::type ShiftVal;
00430   vector<ShiftVal> replace_v1;
00431   replace_v1.push_back(ShiftVarRef(v1[0], compiletime_val<-1>()));
00432   return BuildCT_ELEMENT(stateObj, vararray, replace_v1, v2, b);
00433 }
